showerReviews.reviewText: All facilities are well-maintained and clean. We reserved picnic area 3 and it was big enough for 30 people. It has an on-site grill and a few covered waste bins.  It is 5 minutes away from the beach but the road is unpaved.

We love camping at this place. The facilities are always clean. The park rangers are inviting and very helpful. The camping spots are roomy. Be careful to pay attention to which spot you book because all spots don't have water and electricity for camping. Don't forget to bring an extension cord.
Very clean and quiet campground. Spacious spots with plenty of woods between sites. This is our second visit and will be booking again soon!

We loved our time here! We usually go to Jordan Lake, but with the recent flooding it has been closed, but Falls Lake was just as great! We went to BeaverDam entrance. They have pavilions, grills, bathroom/changing house. Playground. And ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ pool to make it easier to go between them. Locker rooms weren't super clean at our visit towards the end of the day, but we just came prepared with shower shoes and put our towels on surfaces before sitting down. The staff was all friendly.

‚Ä¶ under maintenance or shut because of other reasons this pool was the closest option for me. Friendly staff, but the pool and facility could be updated. When I visited the mens shower only had hot water, staff said they will look into it.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ with depth and plenty of lifeguards are on duty. The women's bathroom facilities are very nice with 4 shower units that provide soap and shampoo for quick showers after swimming. A covered patio area with picnic tables is a great ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ There are lounge chairs and picnic benches available to park your belongings, as well as a very clean bathroom/changing room/shower area. Definitely will be coming back!
